--- Testing vcvtps2dq ---

=== Testing mode: Round to nearest (even) ===

[128-bit version]
Input : 1.500000 -2.500000 3.750000 -4.250000 
Result: 2 -2 4 -4 
Result: 0x2 0xfffffffe 0x4 0xfffffffc 

[256-bit version]
Input : 2147483520.000000 -2147483520.000000 0.000000 -0.000000 nan 1234.567749 -9876.542969 0.000000 
Result: 2147483520 -2147483520 0 0 -2147483648 1235 -9877 0 
Result: 0x7fffff80 0x80000080 0x0 0x0 0x80000000 0x4d3 0xffffd96b 0x0 

[256-bit edge val version]
Input : nan -nan 0.000000 340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 inf -inf -0.000000 -340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 
Result: -2147483648 -2147483648 0 -2147483648 -2147483648 -2147483648 0 -2147483648 
Result: 0x80000000 0x80000000 0x0 0x80000000 0x80000000 0x80000000 0x0 0x80000000 

=== Testing mode: Round down (-inf) ===

[128-bit version]
Input : 1.500000 -2.500000 3.750000 -4.250000 
Result: 1 -3 3 -5 
Result: 0x1 0xfffffffd 0x3 0xfffffffb 

[256-bit version]
Input : 2147483520.000000 -2147483520.000000 0.000000 -0.000000 nan 1234.567749 -9876.542969 0.000000 
Result: 2147483520 -2147483520 0 0 -2147483648 1234 -9877 0 
Result: 0x7fffff80 0x80000080 0x0 0x0 0x80000000 0x4d2 0xffffd96b 0x0 

[256-bit edge val version]
Input : nan -nan 0.000000 340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 inf -inf -0.000000 -340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 
Result: -2147483648 -2147483648 0 -2147483648 -2147483648 -2147483648 -1 -2147483648 
Result: 0x80000000 0x80000000 0x0 0x80000000 0x80000000 0x80000000 0xffffffff 0x80000000 

=== Testing mode: Round up (+inf) ===

[128-bit version]
Input : 1.500000 -2.500000 3.750000 -4.250000 
Result: 2 -2 4 -4 
Result: 0x2 0xfffffffe 0x4 0xfffffffc 

[256-bit version]
Input : 2147483520.000000 -2147483520.000000 0.000000 -0.000000 nan 1234.567749 -9876.542969 0.000000 
Result: 2147483520 -2147483520 0 0 -2147483648 1235 -9876 0 
Result: 0x7fffff80 0x80000080 0x0 0x0 0x80000000 0x4d3 0xffffd96c 0x0 

[256-bit edge val version]
Input : nan -nan 0.000000 340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 inf -inf -0.000000 -340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 
Result: -2147483648 -2147483648 1 -2147483648 -2147483648 -2147483648 0 -2147483648 
Result: 0x80000000 0x80000000 0x1 0x80000000 0x80000000 0x80000000 0x0 0x80000000 

=== Testing mode: Round toward zero ===

[128-bit version]
Input : 1.500000 -2.500000 3.750000 -4.250000 
Result: 1 -2 3 -4 
Result: 0x1 0xfffffffe 0x3 0xfffffffc 

[256-bit version]
Input : 2147483520.000000 -2147483520.000000 0.000000 -0.000000 nan 1234.567749 -9876.542969 0.000000 
Result: 2147483520 -2147483520 0 0 -2147483648 1234 -9876 0 
Result: 0x7fffff80 0x80000080 0x0 0x0 0x80000000 0x4d2 0xffffd96c 0x0

Result: -2147483648 -2147483648 0 -2147483648 -2147483648 -2147483648 0 -2147483648

--- vcvtps2dq test completed ---
